name: FOODIATORS - working build
description:
THIS IS A WORKING BUILD FOR https://lmarchwiak.itch.io/foodiators
Needed to reupload as a separate project, due to Jam still be running.
Only changes made are:
- deleted unused textures to lower the size of a game
- reuploaded as one Zip file

FOODIATORS is a local PvP split-screen game about gladiators fighting using food weapons/shields. The game was made for Houdini game jam 2021.
